name: Alchemist

location: Any Dran overland area (Ironborough / Brocwithe Quarter / Morrow Parish / Lemark District)
unlock: Approach every sewer drain on the edge of any of the Dran overland areas until you get grabbed by a Manticora. Once you load into the new area, defeat the white Manticora

name: Archon
description: The ARCHON is the master of Weapon Mods and Mod Power generation.
unlock: To Unlock the Red Door you will need the following. Engram Explorer with skill Fortune Hunter (LV10), Engram Invader with skill Worm Hole (LV5), Armor set Realmwalker, Relic Consumable Void Heart, Leto's Amulet, Amber Moonstone, Black Cat Band, Zanias Malice, Anastasijas Inspiration, Cube Gun, Ford's Scattergun, Labyrinth Staff. With all this the door will open.

description: The CHALLENGER specializes in close range combat and heightened survivability.
unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

name: Engineer
description: The ENGINEER specializes in Heavy Weaponry which can be carried or placed in turret mode.
location: Any overland area (The Eon Vault / Abyssal Rift / Phantom Wasteland / Timeless Horizon)
unlock: Found just out of bounds in either of the two overland areas you roll on N'Erud. For an easier time locating this item try using the Explorer Archtype's skill "Fortune Hunter" to highlight the item in the fog.

name: Explorer

unlock: Finish a full campaign playthrough

Targets embedded with a rod take 50 SHOCK damage per second. They take 25% additional damage per extra rod in the target. Damage is increased by 1.5x if linked to another rod. Rods in the same target will not link.

Mod Power Requirement: 450

name: Hot Shot
description: Imbues ammunition with FIRE and increases Ranged damage by 15% for 20.3s. Shots also apply BURNING, dealing 300.8 FIRE Damage over 10s. Mod Power Req: 1,250
unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

name: Healing Shot
description:
Launches a payload that explodes on cotact with allies, healing 35% of their max health. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets close. Dorman payload lasts 30s slowly losing healing potency over time.
Mod Power Req: 600
unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

name: Concussive Shot
description:
Fires a focused blast of air through all targets within 8m dealing 155 damage and 4x impact.
Mod Power Req: 450
unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

name: Scrap Shot
description:
Fires a caltrops grenade that explodes to cover area of 6m. Caltrops deal 20 damage per second and apply SLOW to enemies that walk over them. Lasts 10s.
Mod Power Req: 750
unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

name: Voltaic Rondure
description:
Launches a slow-moving orb that pulses every 0.5s, striking enemies within 3m for 20s SHOCK damage and applying OVERLOADED for 15s. The orb lasts 20s. The orb can be overcharged by striking it with additional damage.
Mod Power Req: 850
unlock: Defeat the Bloat King

name: Space Crabs
description:
Launch an alien egg that bursts on impact, releasing 5 Space Crabs. Crabs follow the caster, leaping towards the enemies within 4m, and exploding, dealing 60 Damage each.
Mod Power Req: 450
unlock: Defeat Primogenitor Boss

name: Prismatic Driver
description:
Fires a superheated beam which deals 25 Mod Damage per second. Sustaining the beam on a target causes an explosion which deals 150 Mod damage in a 3m AOE.
Mod Power Req: 50 Per Pulse
unlock: Defeat The Custodian's Eye Boss

name: Tremor
description:
Fires a projectile that cracks the ground and spawns shockwaves that deal 75 damage within 9m for 6s. Shockwaves inflict 3x impact.
Mod Power Req: 900
unlock: Defeat the Mother Mind

name: Fargazer
description:
Calls froth an eye of Legion to gaze at player's AIM target. For every 0.25s Fargazer focuses on a traget within 25m, a stack of MADNESS Status is applied for 5s. Each stack deals 3 Damage per second. Max 10 stacks. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250
unlock: Deafeat Legion Boss

name: Witchfire
description:
Fires a highly volatile projectile that explodes to leave a line of flaming terrain. Deals 55 FIRE damage per second, and applies BURNING, dealing 200 damage over 10s. Lasts 5s.
Mod Power Req: 750
unlock: Defeat Gwendil: The Unburnt

name: Rotted Arrow
description:
Fires a rotten arrow that deals 19.8 damage and detonates for another 60 damage within 4m. A deadly gas cloud is left behind that deals 200 damage over 5s.
Mod Power Req: 400
unlock: Defeat Shrewd Boss

name: Overflow
description:
Imbues ammunition with SHOCK and increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply OVERLOADED, dealing 87.5 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

name: Soulbinder
description:
Fires a projectile that attaches to the enemy dealing 40 damage. Enemies within 7m become bound to the primary target after impact and share 60% of damage dealt to them. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 650
unlock: Compleating the quest reaching the bottom of the Chimney

name: Time Lapse
description:
Creates a 6m blast which freezes all standard enemies for 7s. Dealing damage to frozen enemies immediately breaks the Time Lapse effect, applying SLOW for the remaining duration.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
unlock: Need to find the piece found in Lemark District, by using the same clock hour that the clock in Hewdas Clock. Then fix the clock in Hewdas Clock.

name: Firestorm
description:
Creates a whirling cyclone that sucks in nearby targets and applies BURNING for 10s. The center of the Cyclone deals 75 FIRE damage per second. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250
unlock: Defeat the Red Prince

name: Helix
description:
Shoots a helix of missiles, dealing 120 damage. On contact, divides into 6 smaller rockets which seek additional targets, dealing 30 damage on contact.
Mod Power Req: 850
unlock: Defeat the Astropath

name: Astral Burst
description:
Fires a short range burst of 7 star fragments which deal 35 damage each. Fragments bounce off walls up to 3 times, dealing 35% additional damage per bounce. Weakspot hits deal reduced damage.
Mod Power Req: 450
unlock: From the entrance, the triangle lever should be triggered until the triangle is facing left. The icons lever should be triggered until the doe is in front of you. The circles lever should be triggered until the Ravager, doe and death are encircled with the doe having two circles.

name: Blood Draw
description:
Shoots out razor-sharp Chain Shards which impale up to 5 targets within 15m, dealing 10 damage. On hit, chains are pulled towards the caster, dealing 250 damage split equally among enemies and applying 275 BLEEDING damage over 15s.
Mod Power Req: 450
unlock: Pay the tribute to the Red Prince

name: Bore
description:
Fires a drill projectile, dealing 80 damage. After burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 50% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Last 6s. 
Mod Power Req: 500
unlock: Defeat Abomination Boss

name: Corrosive Rounds
description:
Imbues ammunition with TOXIC and increases Range Crit Chance by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply CORRODED, dealing 150 damage over 10s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250
unlock: Defeat Magister Dullain

name: Defrag
description:
Infects weapon with Malware for 30s, causing shots to apply FRAGMENTED for 5s. When a FRAGMENTED enemy dies, they create a Glitch that lasts 5s.
Picking up a Glitch increases All damage by 20% for 5s.
Destroying a Glitch causes it to destabilize, creating a 5m Virus Pool which deals 25 damage per second and applies the FRAGMENTED debuff to enemies inside. Virus Pools last 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,500
unlock: Defeat Cancer

name: Energy Wall
description:
Deploys an energy barrier on impact with ground. Allies can shoot through Energy Wall but enemy projectiles are absorbed (up to 500 damage received). Max 1 Wall at a time. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 500
unlock: Inside one of the towers of the overland. Take the elevator and it will be at the top of the statue that looks like the ones that holds the Seeker Keys

name: Familiar
description:
Summons Faerie Familiar to aid in combat. The Familiar selects a random enemy within 10m and slashes through them for 25 damage each attack. Familiar will select a new target when the previous one dies. Lasts 25s.
Mod Power Req: 500
unlock: Use the Dreamcatcher on the Huntress while she is asleep. Then use the item to defeat her in her dream

name: Rootlash
description:
Launches a projectile which summons a Root Tentacle. Tentacles deal 30 damage and steal 1.5% of the hero's Max Health per hit. Lasts 20s. (Max 2)
Mod Power Req: 450
unlock: Defeat Kaeula's Shadow

name: Skewer
description:
Fires a Wretched Spear which embeds itself on contact. Spears deal 150 damage on hit, rapidly dividing inside the target until bursting, dealing 350 damage to all targets within 3m. Spears embedded in the environment remain in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 500
unlock: Defeat Venom

name: Song of Eafir
description:
Fires a shot infused with the binding power of the Song of Eafir. Deals massive impact to all enemies in 10m and deals additional damage to Flying enemies. The song continues for 15s, afflicting targets within 15m with SLOW, and a 15% decrease to damage dealt.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
unlock: After lowering the bridge to the Ravager's Lair and before defeating him, talk to The Flautist and you can hear he is playing a new tune. Play that tune on the water Harp to get the The Bolt Driver. 1-4-0-2-5-0-3-0 Then talk to him to be rewarded with the crafting material

name: Stasis Beam
description:
Fires a beam which deals 15 damage per second, and applies SLOW Debuff. After 3s of application to a target, SLOW becomes STASIS, freezing the target in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 50 per Pulse.
unlock: While exploring the overland you will find a room with a door. Open it and use the elevator. Go through the cave killing zombies and at the end of the cave you can find the material.

name: Transpose
description:
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 20s. 
Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to the magazine.
unlock: Defeat the Aberration W.D. 109

name: Feedback
description:
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack.
Level 10: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Harmonizer
description:
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. 
Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Resentment
description:
Gain 10% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present. 
Level 10: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Shield Breaker
description:
Melee Attacks grant a Shield for 2% of Max Health. Max 20%. Last 10s. 
Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks consume all Shield to increase damage of next strike by 1% per Shield Consumed. Max 100%.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Slayer
description:
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Lasts 3s. 
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed by 15%.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Weaponlord
description:
Basic Melee Attack increase the next Charge Attack by 7%. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Dervish
description:
Increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10s when activating a Skill. 
Level 10: Melee kills reduce Skill Cooldowns by 5%. Can trigger once every 5s.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Deadly Calm
description:
Continuosly Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. 
Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Battery
description:
Ranged Hits increase the next Weakspot Hit by 10% per stack. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.
unlock: Buy from Dwell

name: Timewave
description:
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 3.5s.
Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.
unlock: Defeat Restless Spirit Boss

name: Refunder
description:
Shots from this weapon have 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves.
Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.
unlock: Defeat E.D. Alpha

name: Momentum
description:
When this weapon scores a Critical hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks.
Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.
unlock: Defeat Mantagora

name: Lithely
description:
Increase this weapon's Reload Speed by 4% for each enemy killed between reloads. Lasts 15s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Reloading at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.
unlock: Defeat the Aberration Barghest the Vile.

name: Striker
description:
Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3% for 10s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Increases Movement Speed by 3% per stack.
unlock: Defeat Ripsaw Boss

name: Extender
description:
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 30%.
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15%
unlock: Defeat the Aberration Root Hulk

name: Bandit
description:
On hit, grants 10% chanche to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon.
Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s

This will open a door on the side of the main hall, go through it.

description: Gain 1 Health Regeneration per second when within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.

That symbol and colour is the same as some of the fabric that covers the corpses in that room. Note the symbols that match the colour of the first symbol in the book. Then use them in the lock at the end of the room.

name: Braided Thorns
description: After killing an enemy, gain 15% increased Critical Chance for 10s.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Burden of the Audacious
description: Decreases all healing by 75%. Perfect Dodges heal for 15% of Max Health.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Burden of the Destroyer
description: Decreases Ideal Range of all Firearms by 25%. Increases all damage dealt by 15%.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Burden of the Divine
description: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 10%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.

name: Burden of the Follower
description: Reduces Fire Rate by 15%. Increases Mod Power Generation by 50%.

name: Burden of the Gambler
description: Disables Weakspots. Increases Critical Chance by 10% and Critical Damage by 20%.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Burden of the Mariner
description: Increases Skill Cooldowns by 25%. Generate 10% additional Mod Power for each Skill on Cooldown.
unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 10 Iron, 500 Scrap

name: Burden of the Warlock
description: Reduces Mod Power Requirement by 15%. Activating a Mod costs 15% Health as Grey Health. Activation cannot kill Wearer.

name: Burden of the Rebel
description: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15% but reduces Relic Use Speed by 25%.
unlock: Give the Thaen Seed to the Eternal Empress. The seed is inside the Ornate Lockbox which you need the Ornate Key, both found in Yaesha - The Widow's Court

name: Burden of the Stargazer
description: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15%. Activating a Skill costs 15% Health.

name: Fae Shaman Ring
description: Increases Health Regeneration by 0.25 and Relic Use Speed by 25%.

name: Ring of Grace
description: Taking enemy damage causes 10% of Maximum Health to regenerate over 10s.
unlock: Give Dria's Anklet to the man near the World Stone. To get Dria's anklet you need to defeat Barghest the Vile that hides in the bone piles.

name: Ring of the Robust
description: Increases Max Health by 10 and Armor by 15.

name: Timekeeper's Jewel
description: Increases duration of all Status Effects applied by the wearer. Duration varies per Status
unlock: At the top of the clock tower inside a chest.

name: Fae Bruiser Ring
description: Dealing Melee damage grants 2 Stacks of BULWARK for 7s. Does no stack with itself.

name: White Pawn Stamp
description: Reduces Mod Power Requirement by 10%.
unlock: In a large rectangular room there are blue and white torches, change the colors shooting them until all are white.

name: Stream Coupler
description: Using a Skill regenerates 10% of Max Health over 5s.

name: Stockpile Charger
description: Ater picking up ammo, increases the damage of that Ammo Type by 13% for 20s.

name: Outcast Ring
description: Increases Reload Speed by 5% for 15s after reloading. Stacks 5x.
unlock: Give the Spirit Whisp Amulet to the man in the sewers.

name: Ring of the Damned
description: Increase all damage dealt by 10% while Grey Health is present.
unlock: Shoot the hand of a man hanging out with a purple shine, then interact with the severed hand.

name: Shard Banded Ring
description: Increases Mod damage by 12%.

name: Encrypted Ring
description: Using a Mod regenerates 10% of Max health over 10s. Can stack up to 30s.

name: Dense Silicon Ring
description: Gain 200% of Health Regenerated as Mod Power.

name: Ring of Restocking
description: Reloads within 1.5s of a Critical Kill or Weakspot Kill are 20% faster.

name: Vacuum Seal
description: Increases Automatic Pickup Range for Scrap by 100%. Picking up Scrap, Iron or Ammo grants a Shield for 10% of Max Health for 10s. Does not stack.
location: Phantom Wasteland / Tower of the Unseen

name: Momentum Driver
description: Ater Sprinting for 2s, Movement Speed is increased by 15% and Stagger Level reduced by 1.

name: Defensive Action Loop
description: While reloading, and for 3s after reload completes, incoming damage is reduced by 10%.

name: Galvanized Resupply Band
description: Increases Ammo Pickups by 50%
unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

name: Spirit Stone
description: Increases Mod Power generation by 10%

name: Soul Guard
description: Gain a stack of BULWARK for each active Summon.
unlock: Buy from Bloodmoon Altar for 5 Blood Moon Essence

name: Slayer's Crest
description: Increases Melee damage by 25% when attacking enemies from behind
location: Imperial Gardens / The Nameless Nest / The Expanding Glade
unlock: Take the elevator and inside the chest

name: Reaping Stone
description: After an Elemental Status Effect is removed from wearer, they become immune to all Elemental Status Effects and gain 2% base of damage dealt as Lifesteal fo 10s

name: Flyweight's Sting
description: Increases Melee damage while Armor Encumbrance is below 50. Damage bonus increases with lower Encumbrance, up to 25% at 0 Weight.
unlock: Inside a container

name: Kinetic Cycle Stone
description: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 20%

name: Captain's Insignia
description: Increases Revive Speed and Relic Consume Speed by 25% per downed or dead ally. Max 2 stacks.

name: Cataloger's Jewel
description: Automatically generates 8 Mod Power per second.

name: Compulsion Loop
description: After killing an enemy, gain 5% Fire Rate and Melee Attack Speed for 7s. Stacks 3x.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Dead King's Memento
description: Increases Health by 15.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Deceiver's Band
description: After performing a Slide, gain 15% Evade Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 12s.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Drakestone Pearl
description: Enables Stamina Regeneration during Melee Attacks at 20% of the normal rate.
unlock: Get grabbed by a Manticora standing close to a drain. If it leads you to it's lair in the sewers you can get the ring after defeating it.

name: Dran Memento
description: Increases Max Stamina by 20 and reduces Encumbrance by 5.
unlock: Saving the Dran in The Burning Event.

name: Dread Font
description: Increases Grey Health Regeneration rate by 2 per second.

name: Dying Ember
description: Gain 5% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal.

name: Endaira's Endless Loop
description: After Sprinting for 2s, the wearer gains 1.5 Health Regeneration per second until they stop Sprinting.

name: Excess Coil
description: Activating a Skill grants a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Cannot stack with itself. Lasts 10s.
location: Void Vessel Facility / The Hatchery / The Putrid Domain / The Dark Conduit
unlock: Robot Hanger event. When facing W.D. 109 Aberration you need to lure him all the way back to one of the rooms that is locked and has the ring in it.

name: Fae Hunter Ring
description: Increases Range of Firearms by 30%.

name: Fae Protector Signet
description: Increases Max Health and Stamina by 10 and Reduces Encumbrance by 5.
unlock: Defeat all members of the Council

name: Fae Warrior Ring
description: Increases Melee Damage by 15%.

name: Faelin's Sigil
description: Critical and Weak Spot Hits generate 10% additional Mod Power.
unlock: Given by Faelin if you kill Faerin and report to him

name: Feastmaster's Signet
description: Increases active Concoction Limit by 1.
unlock: In the Feast event room there will be a chimney with fire. Crouch through it and at the other side you will find the ring.

name: Frivolous Band
description: Increases Evade Speed by 10%. Perfect Evades increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Speed by 10% for 10s.

name: Game Master's Pride
description: Reduces all healing by 50%. Splits all damage and remaining healing evenly amoung all allies wearing this ring.
unlock: In the bottom left room. You will need to put your white piece in the same corner and another player there to get it. After that leave the bottom left space without any piece.

name: Haymaker's Ring
description: Increase Melee damage by 0.2% for every 1 points of Armor Encumbrance.

name: Hex Ward
description: Prevents CURSE Blight.
unlock: Crafted by Nimue for 5 Lumenite Crystal

name: Lodestone Ring
description: Increases all damage dealt against illuminated enemies by 5%.
unlock: Rewarded by Bedel of the Vaunnt if the players talks to him while wearing the Lodestone Crown after defeating the Ravager.

name: Mechanic's Cog
description: While carrying an Engineer Heavy Weapon, gain 15% Movement Speed and 1s BULWARK
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Metal Driver
description: Killing Blows increase Reload Speed by 5% for 7s. Stacks 3x.
unlock: Wait in the second spinning tower to access the secret entrance. Behind the House Lythla Glyph, to the left, there is a breakable object you can shoot and jump over the ledge to find a secret entrance.

name: Meteorite Shard Ring
description: Increases Encumbrance by 50. Increases Unarmed damage by 50%.
unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 10 Iron, 750 Scrap

name: Microcompressor
description: Reduces Heat Generation when firing weapons that Overheat by -30%. Increases Heat Reduction Rate by 30%.
unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 10 Forged Iron, 750 Scrap

name: Point Focus Ring
description: Reduces Initial Spread and Recoil by 35%.

name: Power Saver
description: At Max Health, gain a 25% chance to not use a Relic charge.

name: Propulsion Loop
description: After killing an enemy, increases Movement Speed by 5% and Consumable Use Speed by 10% for 10s. Stacks 3x.
location: Astropath's Respite / Terminus Station / Tower of the Unseen / Spectrum Nexus
unlock: While riding an elevator check the walls to find a hole, follow the path to find the ring.

name: Rerouting Cable
description: Gain 5% of Max Health as a SHIELD for 5s after spending 25 Stamina. Accumulation resets after 5s of inaction. Max 50% SHIELD.
location: Vault of the Formless / Void Vessel Facility

name: Restriction Cord
description: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces all incoming damage by 10%.
unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt

name: Ring of Crisis
description: When wearer's Health drops below 25%, gain a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Lasts 10s.
unlock: Inside the dungeon you will find the Aerary Glyph that unlocks the locked door. After defeating the Aberration The Progeny you can find the ring.

name: Ring of Deflection
description: Direct Damage against wearer has a 20% Chance to be converted entirely to Grey Health.
unlock: In the dungeon there will be an area that activates a purple Orb that will follow you to take you down. In the area you will find the ring.

name: Ring of Omens
description: Evades cost 15% Max Health as Grey Health instead of Stamina.
unlock: During a Blood Moon, you will need to solve the puzzle to enter the room at the right from when you enter to obtain it. If it's not during a Blood Moon the trapdor won't open.

name: Ring of Retribution
description: Incoming enemy damage increases Reload Speed and all outgoing damage by 10%. Lasts 15s.
location: Random world drop / The Tormented Asylum
unlock: At the Nightweaver's Web you will need to give it the Dria's Anklet quest item.

name: Rock of Anguish
description: Gain 5% Movement Speed and 7.5% Reload Speed for every 25% of Max Health missing.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Rotward
description: Prevents ROOT ROT Blight.
unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt

name: Rusted Heirloom
description: Grants 2 Stacks of BULWARK below 50% Max HP.
unlock: Inside a Safe (3581). The code could be found using your flashlight to lit the numbers in the area.

name: Sapphire Dreamstone
description: Critical Hits reduce Skill Cooldowns by 3%. Can only happen once every 2s.
unlock: You have to take the secret passage in The Executioner Event. To enter this event you need to shoot a painting that you find when your character says "something's odd

name: Seal of the Empress
description: Increases Max Health by 20. Reduces Max Stamina by 10.
unlock: Finish the quest without giving any specific item. For that you will need to defeat the world boss and come back to talk to her.

name: Singed Ring
description: Increases all damage dealt to BURNING enemies by 10%.
unlock: At the Burning Event, watch or fail the event. Rest at a checkpoint, comeback to see a pig is eating the corpse. Kill the pig to obtain the ring.

name: Stone of Malevolence
description: Elemental Status damage generates 15% additional Mod Power.

name: Tarnished Ring
description: Increases damage of Unarmed Attacks by 30%.
unlock: Behind Whisper's there is a ladder, climb it and talk to the man that is up there. If he's sleeping change worlds and try again.

name: Tear of Kauela
description: Increases Relic capacity by 2 while equipped

name: Tempest Conduit
description: After receiving Elemental Damage, increases all damage dealt by 10% and Resistance to the received Element by 20 for 20s.
unlock: At the end of the dungeon there is a preassure plate that opens a wall, at the end of the preasure plate maze is the ring.

name: Tightly Wound Coil
description: When spending 75% or more of current magazine, gain a SHIELD of 10% of Max Health for 5s. Does not stack with itself.
unlock: Inside a capsule.

name: Tomb Dweller's Ring
description: Increases Movement Speed by 10% for 7s after Vaulting, Climbing, Leaping, and entering Water, stacks 1x. Reduces Fall Damage by 25%.

name: Wax Sealed Ring
description: Killing blows increase Ranged and Melee Damage by 4% for 15s. Stacks 3x.
location: The Far Woods / The Forbidden Grove

name: Wind Hollow Circlet
description: Increases Reload Speed by 12%.
unlock: There is a circular building that sounds like a didgeridoo, each floor does one note. Behind a waterfall there is a book with the songs you need to play. Play the song of the Queen to get the Wind Hollow Circlet.

name: Zania's Malice
description: Dealing Weakspot damage increases Weakspot damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 3x.

name: Anahae Crystal
description: Deal 5% additional damage for each Status Effect the target is suffering from.
unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Yaesha World.

name: Band of Accord
description: Ammo acquired on pickup is increased by 25% per ally also wearing this ring and is shared with other allies.
unlock: Buy from Reggie after killing 25 Aberrations

name: Black Cat Ring
description: When taking fatal damage, instead of dying, the wearer's Health will drop to 1, and Movement Speed will increase by 25% for 10s. 2m cooldown.
unlock: Buy it from Reggie after dying 15 times

name: Blackout Ring
description: After dealing 20% of the Weapon's Total Magazine base damage, increases Reload Speed by 3%. Stacks 5x Cleared on Reload.
unlock: There is a room with crates that if you break there is hole that leads you to a room. Just before the exit of the room there is a hole that let you shoot into a the cable that gives energy to the door locked, shoot it.

name: Bright Steel Ring
description: Gives the wearer the fastest evade roll regardless of ther Armor Encumbrance.
unlock: Buy from Reggie after finishing 15 Worlds, inlcuding adventure ones.

name: Devourer Loop
description: Critical Hits have a 1% chance to reset Skill Cooldowns. Can only occur once every 10s. Increases all incoming damage by 10%
unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Apocalypse Difficulty Playthrough

name: Dran Scavenger Ring
description: Collection Scrap, Iron and Ammo pickups regenerates 10% of Max Health and increases all damage dealt by 8% for 30s.
unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Losomn World.

name: Drzyr Sniper Sigil
description: Increases the minimum damage at Max Falloff Range from 20% to 40%.
unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat N'Erud World.

name: Embrace of Sha'Hala
description: Wearer gains 5% incoming damage reduction for each Negative Status Effect or Blight they are suffering from. Max 4 stacks.
unlock: Talk to The Custodian after defeating Sha'Hala

name: Focusing Shard
description: Reduce Recoil by 25%. Aiming Down Sights gradually reduces Spread by 35% over 3.5s
unlock: In the dungeon there will be an area that activates a purple Orb that will follow you to take you down. In the area you will find the ring.

name: Provisioner Ring
description: Firearms reload over time while stowed.
unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Labyrinth World.

name: Ring of Flawed Beauty
description: Ranged Weakspot damage is increased by 25%. Ranged damage is reduced by 15% when failing to hit a Weakspot.
unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

name: Supression Ward
description: Prevents SUPPRESSION Blight.
unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 5 Iron, 250 Scrap

name: Faerin's Sigil
description: Critical and Weakspot Hits generates 10% additional Mod Power.
unlock: Given by Fearin, after killing Fealin

name: Zohee's Ring
description: Increases Mod Duration by 15%.
unlock: Given by the Attendant after being arrested and killing the corruptor

name: Radiant Visage
description: The cowl is a striking blue, which contrasts with the large, featureless golden mask that covers the face of the wearer. This armor was highly coveted and only granted to those few who were recognized as the "Radiant Ones."

name: Realmwalker Gloves
description: Ford's gloves were designed for warmth and dexterity. The soldier who wore these was not swinging blades or forging metal. He was pulling triggers and throwing grenades

name: Red Widow Raiment
description: This chestpiece must be hundreds -thousands- of years old, yet it shows no signi of rust or decay. One can only imagine a Pan king or queen wearing such  majestic regalia.

name: Navigator's Helm
unlock: Kill a rare N'Erud Zombie (Navigator Zombie) who's wearing the Navigator Helm.

name: Faelin
description: Light boss
unlock: Outside the big door there is a plate with a lever in the middle where you need to insert 2 masks. When you pull the lever will be transported to Beatific or Malefic Gallery. For Faelin you need to be in the Beatific.

name: Faerin
description: Dark boss
unlock: Outside the big door there is a plate with a lever in the middle where you need to insert 2 masks. When you pull the lever will be transported to Beatific or Malefic Gallery. For Faerin you need to be in the Malefic.

name: Nightweaver
unlock: Defeat her normally.

name: Nightweaver Spectral
unlock: This is easier done in the first phase. When she summons minions she will have in her chest a bright spot, that's her Heart, destroy it and defeat her.

name: Sha'Hala Spectral
unlock: Interact just with the terminal to defeat the Spectral form of Sha'hala.

name: Sha'Hala
unlock: Before interacting with the terminal use the Override Pin in the hole the terminal has, after that defeat the Physical form of Sha'hala. This will cause your N'Erud world ends so make sure you have collected everything beforehand.

name: Tal'Ratha
unlock: When you talk to him refuse to be eaten. It won't be that obvious but the dialog will be in that line. After that defeat him.

name: Tal'Ratha Metaphysical
unlock: When you talk to him let him eat you. It won't be that obvious but the dialog will be in that line. After that defeat him.

name: Corruptor
unlock: Defeat The Corruptor when at least you kill one time the Guardian.

name: Corruptor
unlock: Defeat The Corruptor but don't kill Guardian, not even once.

name: Corrupted Ravager
unlock: The Ravager will ask you to kill the Doe. Shoot the Ravager to start the fight and then kill the Doe before he does.

name: Corrupted Ravager
unlock: The Ravager will ask you to kill the Doe. Shoot the Ravager to start the fight, be carefull to not kill the Doe midfight, after that at some point of the fight the Ravager will eat the Doe.

name: Corrupted Ravager
unlock: Kill the Doe when The Ravager asks to kill it.

name: Corrupted Ravager
unlock: Heal the Doe when The Ravager asks to kill it.

name: Labyrinth Sentinel
unlock: Shoot the white squares on the cubes. When you hit all the white squares of a cube it stops having purple light around it.

name: Annihilation
unlock: Defeat Annihilation

name: Crown of the Red Prince
description: A flashy, flame-hot diadem that demands respect and attention in equal measure...were there any subjects left to offer such sentiments.

name: Field Medic Mask
description: This face covering protects you from contagions without obstructing your sight. You feel like a creature from another world in this thing. Perhaps that's fitting.

name: Revivalist
description: Increases the Speed of Reviving and being Revived
unlock: Revive a teammate 15 times
